title: Hark! Ten Thousand Harps And Voices
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c v4 c v5 c

v1: Hark! Ten thousand harps and voices
Sound the note of praise above;
Jesus reigns, the God of love.
See, He sits on yonder throne:
v2: Sing how Jesus came from heaven,
How He bore the cross below,
How all pow'r to Him is given,
How He reigns in glory now.
Oh, 'tis sweet to sing of Him.
v3: All above and gives it worth;
Lord of life, Thy smile enlightens,
Cheers, and charms Thy saints on earth.
When we think of love like Thine,
Lord, we own it love divine.
v4: Nothing from Thy love shall sever
Those whom Thou hast made Thine own:
v5: Bring, oh, bring the glorious day,
Heav'n and earth shall pass away.
Then with raptured hearts we'll sing,
